channel.title: [Srl][RS2] Extreme300's AutoTyper
channel.description:
This is the first script that I have created for RuneScape.
What it does is you set the messages that you want automatically typed, after you press either F9,10,11, or 12, it automatically types it.
On future releases I am going to add the choice to have it type instantly, or what it is set to now which is a more human-like typing. I also plan on adding forms.
[b]Please give feedback, and tips and ideas on how i could improve this script.[/b] [b]v0.2 out[/b] This new release now uses forms [b]v0.3 Released!!!![/b] v0.3 Can choose between fast type or human-like [b]v1.0 Released!!!![/b] I've added on a color and effect selection to the form [s][b]v1.1 Released!!!![/b] Choose if you want to use colors/effects[/s] removed 1.1 because it sucked, 1.0 works flawlessly though [b]v1.2 Released!!!![/b] I've changed the script a bit to make it work better, and I added an auto trade feature. Also changed a problem some people had with the script.

item.title: [Srl][RS2] Extreme300's AutoTyper

@extreme300 wrote:

This is the first script that I have created for RuneScape.

What it does is you set the messages that you want
automatically typed, after you press either F9,10,11, or 12, it
automatically types it.

On future releases I am going to add the choice
to have it type instantly, or what it is set to now which is
a more human-like typing. I also plan on adding forms.

Please give feedback, and tips and ideas on how i could improve this
script.
v0.2 out
This new release now uses forms
v0.3 Released!!!
v0.3 Can choose between fast type or human-like
v1.0 Released!!!
I’ve added on a color and effect selection to the form
v1.1 Released!!!
Choose if you want to use colors/effects
removed 1.1 because it sucked, 1.0 works flawlessly though
v1.2 Released!!!
I’ve changed the script a bit to make it work better, and I added an auto trade feature. Also changed a problem some people had with the script.
